title: This disabled man is playing support role with his feets only :)

replies.body: as much as i want to make the "supports are disabled" joke, i don't want to ruin this post, respect for that dude for his well and dedication

> [{quoted}](name=crispy66,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FoyqPwTN,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-10-10T15:48:06.168+0000)
>
> as much as i want to make the "supports are disabled" joke, i don't want to ruin this post, respect for that dude for his well and dedication

Ya got downvoted anyway bro. There are sensitive people out there
they're not sensitive they hate that poor guy, they will downvote anyone cheering for him, they're heartless people
tfw this guy can reach gold playing with his feet and yet there are somehow fully functionally people out there that struggle to get out of bronze/silver
trust me, theres no "fully functional" people in plat let alone silver bronze :D
You didn't say gold, That means i'm fully functional ^_^
he did the Alistar combo better than most people...

> [{quoted}](name=LeftyRaydy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FoyqPwTN,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-10-10T17:47:38.713+0000)
>
> he did the Alistar combo better than most people...

Tbh u MUST be disabled to miss the combo ever since they changed it so you can buffer Q. Unless you have 500 ping it's impossible to miss
Good on him.  League is played with your head—not your hands.

haha this is gold, you really made my day, the guy is a beast

it might also create some funny scenario, imagine having a hater as adc who after some miss-plays tell the guy that he must be disabled, and the guy would be like, 'k, so what?'

nah honestly, all respect to this guy, mad props
Can he clap tho
MEME REVIEW!

That's awesome.

Lot of respect for him.
respect
Not gonna lie, this is really awesome. :)
BOXFEET?!
How he flashes, using items, pinging etc?
I already knew he was a support main after reading the first 3 words
I hate everyone on these forums. respect for this guy tho.
This is the ultimate show of how much skill you need to play support.
